text: <@U0MS9352A>, not sure on the mechanism behind hard fork but the code I believe is on the <http://slock.it|slock.it> blog.  Go to the main page and scroll down.  Interested in your take.  Cheers!
sorry for the delayed response.  I usually get an email notice of a new response but...
<@U0MS9352A>: try this link; <https://blog.slock.it/proposed-hard-fork-specification-394245b968dd#.nahppqgcx>.  Likely updated since July 5th so check Git directly.
